headline: Western Digital (WDC) Named “Top Pick,” Soars 14.6%
summary: We recently published 10 Big Names With Double-Digit Upsides. Western Digital Corp. (NASDAQ:WDC) is one of last week’s top performers. Shares of Western Digital surged by 14.56 percent week-on-week to touch a new all-time high after Morgan Stanley named it as its “top pick” across the sector. On Friday, Western Digital Corp. headline: Western Digital Corporation (WDC) Is At 13 Times Earnings, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Jim Cramer Discussed As He Warned About Big Risk To Big Tech. Western Digital Corporation (NASDAQ:WDC) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed.
